name: Melissa¹
descriptions: Melissa Lewis is a Great Khan member camped out near Quarry Junction in the Mojave Wasteland in 2281.
Melissa is the daughter of Chomps Lewis and a member of the Great Khans.
Melissa and two other Khans are awaiting a chems shipment at the Great Khan encampment above Quarry Junction.

Melissa is unaware of, and unrelated to, the Great Khan crew led by Jessup and McMurphy that ambushed the Courier under Benny, and she does not know of any other Great Khan gangs operating as far into NCR territory as she is (not that she would willingly out a fellow Great Khan).

Melissa's New Zealand accent was the result of a miscommunication between Joshua Sawyer and another developer that ignored his instructions for all characters native to the Mojave Wasteland to have American accents. Although Sawyer stated that it was a good performance, the strong accent was unintentional and by the time he heard the voice lines, it was too late to change it.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: That's close enough. What do you want with the Great Khans?

topics.topic_text: Regis says I should talk to you about speaking against the Great Khans' alliance with Caesar.
topics.response_text: You can ask, but why would I do that? Karl's told me all about life in the Legion! He says I've got all the makings of a{SPECK-you-la-tore-ay; over-enunciate like she's not familiar with the word}speculatore.

topics.topic_text: Did he also tell you women aren't permitted to serve in the Legion?
topics.response_text: What? No, he... what do you mean, aren't allowed to serve? Why would he lie about that?

topics.topic_text: If the Great Khans join the Legion, you'll be sold as a slave. An officer's wife, if you're lucky.
topics.response_text: That lying little weasel! I almost fell for it, too! All right, you've got a deal. You can tell Papa I won't support an alliance.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Don't leave a trail.

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for some Great Khans who stole something from me in Goodsprings.
topics.response_text: The only Khans this far into NCR territory is me and my crew, and I didn't steal squat from you.

topics.topic_text: What are you doing up here?
topics.response_text: Awaiting a delivery, but it's a no-show. I'm guessing that the Deathclaws in the quarry have something to do with that.

topics.topic_text: I'll help you with your problem.
topics.response_text: {not trusting player}Is that right? What's your angle?

topics.topic_text: What kind of delivery are you expecting?
topics.response_text: Supplies to make chems. The NCR's the best source since they're hard to come by anywhere else.

topics.topic_text: Seems like an odd place to pick up a delivery.
topics.response_text: The Khans and the NCR don't get along - they prefer to shoot us on sight, even if we're not looking for a fight.

topics.topic_text: No angle. I just want to help.
topics.response_text: {still not trusting}Right. All right, here's the deal.

topics.topic_text: A favor for a favor.
topics.response_text: All right, fair enough. You help us out, and I'll owe you one.

topics.topic_text: Well, I am expecting to be paid, of course.
topics.response_text: That's a motive I can understand.

topics.topic_text: Are these chemicals dangerous?
topics.response_text: I wouldn't eat or drink them, but no, they won't explode if you drop them or anything.

topics.topic_text: Got it. Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: {slightly suspicious}Like what?

topics.topic_text: Anything else I should know?
topics.response_text: Don't kill anybody if you don't have to. I'm a scout, and I like to keep a low profile.

topics.topic_text: I got the chems for you.
topics.response_text: You actually came through for us. I... didn't expect that. Anyway, the Great Khans pay their debts and don't forget their friends.

topics.topic_text: Your supplier was exposed. There won't be any more chemical supplies.
topics.response_text: {suspicious}Uh-huh. And how exactly was he exposed?

topics.topic_text: Tell me about the Great Khans.
topics.response_text: We're an independent group. We take care of our own and don't take crap from anybody, especially the NCR.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> Just trying to get on the good side of the Great Khans.
topics.response_text: That's a smart move. The Great Khans look out for their friends.

topics.topic_text: What happened between the Great Khans and the NCR?
topics.response_text: Bitter Springs happened. Women and children died when the NCR attacked the Great Khans there, and the NCR just pretends it never happened.

topics.topic_text: Where can I find the rest of the Great Khans?
topics.response_text: Our main camp is up in Red Rock Canyon, but we don't allow just anyone to come on in.

topics.topic_text: Simple. I turned him in.
topics.response_text: {furious}I knew I shouldn't have trusted you! You're going to pay for that!

topics.topic_text: He was sloppy and trusted the wrong person.
topics.response_text: {annoyed}Well, fuck. I can't believe I'm going back to Red Rock empty-handed. Thanks for trying to help.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> Beats me.
topics.response_text: I don't think that's the whole story, but fuck it. I'm going back to Red Rock. I've had enough of this place.

topics.topic_text: Is this delivery legal?
topics.response_text: I doubt the NCR thinks so. Heh.

topics.topic_text: How did you end up joining the Great Khans?
topics.response_text: {slight wincing}It wasn't easy. There's a lot of initiation rituals to go through, and I've got the scars to prove it.
